CustomField.description: the congressional district of the project or program
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
tEnter the Congressional District in the format: 2 character State Abbreviation - 3 character District Number. Examples: CA-005 for California's 5th district, CA-012 for California's 12th district.
If all districts in a state are affected, enter ""all"" for the district number. Example: MD-all for all congressional districts in Maryland.
If nationwide (all districts in all states), enter US-all.
If the program/project is outside the US, enter 00-000.
CustomField.label: Congressional District of Project
